title: Pilot
description: On her sixteenth birthday, Sabrina Spellman is informed by her aunts, Hilda and Zelda, that she, along with everybody on her father's side of the family, is a witch. However, Sabrina doesn't believe that she has magical powers until she unintentionally turns the head cheerleader at school into a pineapple.

title: Bundt Friday
description: Sabrina slips Libby some truth sprinkles to make her confess to spreading nasty lies, but her plan backfires when the goodies make Jenny reveal she's sweet on Sabrina's love interest, Harvey. Meanwhile, Hilda prepares for a date with Drell - despite his having stood her up over 1,000 times in the past.

title: The True Adventures of Rudy Kazootie
description: While babysitting a cranky toddler and trying to have a study date with Harvey, Sabrina accidentally casts a spell transforming him into a grown man. Unable to figure out the mystery behind the spell, a frantic Sabrina tries to locate her aunts for assistance before Rudy's parents arrive home and realize they've missed an immense portion of their son's life.

title: Terrible Things
description: Sabrina makes three wishes come true for her unsuspecting friends: Jenny gets elected student president, Harvey becomes a football star, and Mr. Pool becomes rich. Soon she learns the truth of her aunts' warnings that one shouldn't meddle with the fate of others: Jenny is crushed when she learns the student president is merely a rubber stamp assistant to the principal, and resigns in favor of Libby, Harvey really can't play football and is injured on the field, and Mr. Pool's success at alchemy turns him into an obnoxious blow hard.

title: A Halloween Story
description: When she's forced to attend a family affair, Sabrina sends a clone to Harvey's party, where the simple-minded stand-in (who can only speak three sentences) agrees to streak naked in order to liven up the festivities. Meanwhile, the real Sabrina desperately tries to ditch her relatives: an obnoxious socialite and her brat of a daughter, whose hobby is putting people she dislikes into jars. Knowing Harvey plans to dress as James Dean, Sabrina muses about the real star, but when her aunts give her a special Halloween present of a half hour with the dead person of her choice, she opts for her beloved grandmother instead, because "Halloween is really about family."

title: Dream Date
description: Sabrina's bummed when Harvey agrees to go to the dance with Libby, so she decides to skip the event until her aunts use some "man dough" to create her perfect date. Actually, he's a little too perfect, Sabrina has to admit to herself that she prefers Harvey, but can only tell him so when she temporarily freezes him. Harvey prefers Sabrina as well, but is too shy to tell her. Meanwhile, Hilda and Zelda's dough dates aren't too well blended either, and Libby fall for the dough boy and is devastated when he disintegrates, thinking he has dumped her.

title: Third Aunt from the Sun
description: Sabrina visits an aunt in Pleasuredome---a realm where every wish is granted---and decides to stay for good.

title: Magic Joel
description: Hoping to catch Harvey's eye, Sabrina becomes an assistant to Joel, a shy teen magician, but the act is more comical than bewitching when the trickster's tricks misfire. To save him from embarrassment, Sabrina makes the magic man temporarily invisible - then discovers that he likes it and doesn't want to reappear, especially when he can scope out the girls' locker room. Meanwhile, Aunt Zelda entertains an old colleague who has been too shy to admit his attraction to her.

title: Geek Like Me
description: Sabrina tires of Libby's constant teasing-- which worsens when Sabrina joins a science club-- so she gives the tormentor a taste of the taunting by turning her into a nerd. Meanwhile, Zelda wants Hilda to throw out some very old items. Tired of watching Libby treat people badly, Sabrina decides to give Libby a taste of her own medicine by transforming her into a geek. However, when Libby succeeds in turning her fellow geeks against the entire school, Sabrina must find a way to unite her classmates before the plan backfires.

title: Sweet & Sour Victory
description: Sabrina learns a hard lesson in witchcraft when she tries to make Harvey notice her by using her powers to become an instant kung-fu expert under Mr. Pool's astonished tutelage. She easily defeats the standing champion, but must face the disapproval of her aunts and the jeers of the (magically animated) trophy she won. Meanwhile, Aunt Hilda tries out for first violin in the local symphony the mortal way, but loses to her longtime rival Gustav.

title: A Girl and Her Cat
description: After Salem stows away in her backpack and gets her thrown out of the local pizzeria, Sabrina washes her hands of the cat, feigning unconcern when the feline fails to return for Christmas dinner with visiting cousin Monty. When she discovers that Salem has in fact been catnapped by a stubborn little boy named Rex, Sabrina launches a desperate plan to rescue him by impersonating Santa Claus.

title: Trial by Fury
description: When Sabrina's bitter math teacher Mr. Rothwell singles her out for unfair treatment, and her aunts are unable to make him see reason, the witch trio decide it's time to teach him a few of their own spellbinding lessons. When he's hauled into traffic court, they replace the human judge with a magical substitute who's been hibernating in a deep freeze "to prevent media bias." Meanwhile, Salem panics when his ex-girlfriend decides to pay him a surprise visit especially since she has no idea that he has been turned into a cat.

title: Jenny's Non-Dream
description: When Sabrina is apprehensive about inviting Jenny to spend the night because of her "unique" home life, Hilda and Zelda assure her that she has nothing to worry about. But when Jenny accidentally enters the other realm through the linen closet, Drell cites the rule against mortals entering his world and turns her into a grasshopper, so Sabrina and her aunts must find a way to convince her that the whole experience was just a dream.

title: Sabrina Through the Looking Glass
description: A stressed-out Sabrina gets a monstrous wart, which only worsens her foul mood. And despite everyone's efforts to cheer her, she seeks solace and solitude in an alternate world inside her mirror, where she becomes trapped in her own bad mood. To Jenny for ignoring her, to Harvey for ridiculing his use of a puppet spider monkey to get them through a school assignment she flubbed, and to Libby for turning her into a goat.

title: Hilda and Zelda: the Teenage Years
description: When Sabrina is disappointed that her aunts won't let her stay out late to see a famous rock band Violent Femmes, Hilda and Zelda decide to transform themselves into teenage chaperone's as a compromise. But they're the ones causing the trouble when "Hillary" clashes with a security guard and a high-school boy falls for "Zellery." After proving that even teenage aunts can be embarrassing, they apologize by giving Sabrina her very first flying lesson -- aboard a vacuum cleaner.

title: Mars Attracts!
description: A starry-eyed Sabrina hates to leave Harvey for a family skiing trip to Mars, but Doug, the good-looking and magically talented ski coach she meets there, soon has her forgetting to phone home while they spend a romantic evening together. Meanwhile, Hilda meets a man who claims to be a secret agent on a dangerous mission, which she assumes is just another holiday-on-Mars fib; and Salem takes the opportunity to host a riotous cat party at home.

title: First Kiss
description: A Valentine's Day episode shows that while dating is tough when you're a teenager, it's even tougher when you're a teenage witch. Just as Sabrina and Harvey are about to share their first kiss, Salem desperately interrupts them. Sabrina's cat isn't trying to be a pest, and no, he's not jealous; rather, the feline knows that a kiss from Sabrina will turn Harvey or any boy for that matter into a frog. In order to reverse the tragic spell, Sabrina must pass the Witches' Council's "Test of True Love" to prove that her feelings for Harvey are genuine.

title: Sweet Charity
description: Hoping to encourage more students to join the Adopt-A-Grandparent program, Sabrina finds a mischievous way to get trend-setting Libby to participate: she impersonates her, necessitating quick Superman-style telephone booth transformation whenever the real Libby turns up. But Sabrina's well-meant scheme goes wrong when Libby bonds with Sabrina's adopted grandmother Nana, who claims to know most of Hollywood's young hunks personally. Meanwhile, Zelda can't decide whether to continue dating a man who is centuries younger than she is; and Hilda and Salem eat too much of a magical "hair soup" that causes their hair to grow at an exponential rate.

title: Cat Showdown
description: Sabrina has blown her allowance, and Salem has maxed out his credit card over the phone, so they decide to enter a cat show to earn the prize money, but soon find themselves wrapped up in a blackmail scheme to force the judge to throw the competition, and, to avoid being caught, Sabrina has to transform herself into a contestant. Meanwhile, Hilda and Zelda seek out a magical perfume that will make Zelda repulsive to their love-sick mailman Dirk, and Hilda gets shrunk as a punishment for taking free samples in the magical "Full Moon" shop.

title: Meeting Dad's Girlfriend
description: Preparing for her father's monthly visit, Sabrina anticipates the teenage trauma of introducing her father to her boyfriend (actually, Edward and Harvey do reasonably well), but isn't prepared for the teenage trauma of meeting your divorced father's new girlfriend, an attractive supernatural lawyer named Gail. Initially hostile, Sabrina is persuaded by her aunts to see reason and tries to make amends by asking whether Edward and Gail plan to get married. When they simultaneously answer "Yes" (Gail) and "No" (Edward), Gail furiously dives into Sabrina's magic book.

title: As Westbridge Turns
description: Sabrina, bored with her life, opens a magical can of worms which instantly transforms Sabrina's life into a dramatic soap opera. However, things don't go exactly as the teen witch originally planned, especially when she gets accused of being a thief.

title: The Great Mistake
description: Sabrina hits a really bad day: disregarding her aunts' warning, she buys a "tomorrow" ball from a supernatural traveling salesman, and believes its prediction that she will get an "A-" on her science project. Unfortunately, Mr. Pool doesn't share that estimation of her work, and gives her a C- and a chance to redo the project overnight. Instead, Sabrina tries to sneak out of the house aboard her trusty vacuum cleaner to attend a "Smashing Pumpkins" concert, but gets pulled over by a flying motorcycle cop and cited for flying over the town "with a full bag and bad dust emissions.

title: The Crucible
description: Sabrina's fears become reality when she takes part in a re-creation of the Salem witch trials and is accused of sorcery while defending Jenny's honor. Libby made up a bunch of lies, just to get rid of Sabrina and Jenny, accusing them of practice witchcraft. At the end, all teachers realizes that she was lying, and Sabrina casted a spell on her as a revenge.

title: Troll Bride
description: When Sabrina can't find her homework, she follows Salem's advice to consult a professional magic finder, but when troll Roland appears and quickly uncovers her missing notebook, he demands her hand in marriage as payment. Following him home to attempt reason she is trapped in his castle and can only be rescued by the prince she loves: Harvey. Has the moment come when he will learn the truth about Sabrina's unusual family?

title: Sabrina Gets Her License: Part 1
description: All of Sabrina's responsibilities as student, girlfriend and witch pile up on her as she fails her witch's exam and ends up at witch boot camp.

title: Sabrina Gets Her License: Part 2
description: Sabrina plans to escape from boot camp to be with Harvey.

title: Dummy for Love
description: Sabrina finds out that her vice-principal Mr Kraft has a crush on Hilda and sets the two up on a date. But Hilda can't stand him, so Sabrina turns her into a dummy and follows them on the date. Thanks to Hilda, Zelda must do community service in the Other Realm

title: Dante's Inferno
description: Harvey tells Sabrina his parents want him to start dating other girls. Sabrina's aunts agree and set her up with a witch called Dante. They click and then go on a double date with Harvey and his date Jean. But Dante has a problem with not using magic in the mortal realm. Zelda uses the same dating service and has trouble finding a date, as does Valerie. Meanwhile, Hilda has a dose of 'Pun-Itis' which causes puns in her sentences to come true.

title: A Doll's Story
description: Sabrina decides to babysit her bratty cousin Amanda, who becomes bored and transforms Sabrina into a doll. Sabrina meets three other human-turned-dolls in Amanda's toy box and they plan to escape. Meanwhile, Hilda and Zelda try to spend time separately at a spa in the Other Realm.

title: Sabrina, the Teenage Boy
description: Sabrina can't understand boys and when she senses something between Harvey and Valerie, she turns herself into a boy but ends up dating Libby. Hilda also transforms into a man to try and get rid of Mr Kraft.

title: A River of Candy Corn Runs Through It
description: Valerie announces an unplanned Halloween party at Sabrina's who decides to whip one up and has to deal with her aunts' talking furniture.

title: Inna-Gadda-Sabrina
description: After Salem swallows a time-ball Sabrina's entire existence swirls back to the 1960's.

title: Witch Trash
description: After Sabrina's country cousins express their anger over Sabrina getting the family spell book, they magically lock the Spellmans and their guests in the house.

title: To Tell a Mortal
description: On Friday the 13th a witch can tell a mortal about being a witch because at the end of the day they will forget about their secret so Sabrina tells Valerie and Harvey.

title: Oh What a Tangled Spell She Weaves
description: Sabrina must learn that spells worded too generally affect her entire world. She also sends Salem and her Aunts to Merlin's castle.

title: Sabrina Claus
description: Sabrina meets the real Santa Claus named 'Bob' and has to fill in for him when he is injured.

title: Little Big Kraft
description: Sabrina turns Mr. Kraft into an obnoxious and irresponsible teenager and almost ruins the high school ski trip.

title: Five Easy Pieces of Libby
description: While working on a float with Libby, Sabrina casts a spell that keeps her away from Sabrina. The spell is reversed and they have to spend time together. Finally Libby turns into a puzzle that Sabrina has to solve.

title: Finger Lickin' Flu
description: Sabrina's magic accidentally gets transfered to Mrs. Quick who turns Mr. Kraft into a chimp.

title: Sabrina and the Beanstalk
description: Sabrina accidentally whips up a giant beanstalk and Harvey ends up on top of it being fattened up by a hungry witch.

title: The Equalizer
description: Roland the Troll is a magic policeman and steals Sabrina's heart after she misuses magic.

title: The Band Episode
description: Some bottled talent drinks make Sabrina's band (Harvey and Valerie) very hot, but also ruins their friendships.

title: When Teens Collide
description: Sunspots cause havoc with witches as Sabrina and Libby change personalities which Salem takes advantage of.

title: My Nightmare, the Car
description: Sabrina and Valerie share a car that Sabrina gets from the Other Realm that talks and prefers Sabrina.

title: Fear Strikes Up a Conversation
description: Sabrina erases her fears before reading an essay in front of a school assembly and her fears stalk the the school halls causing everyone to be afraid of the smallest things.

title: Quiz Show
description: When Sabrina complains about her Quizmaster he gets reassigned just before Sabrina's hardest test.

title: Disneyworld
description: Her class goes to Disneyworld where Sabrina turns Libby and Valerie into zebras.

title: Sabrina's Choice
description: When Sabrina plays one aunt against the other they decide to setup separate households and Sabrina has to decide between them.

title: Rumor Mill
description: The rumors that are being spread in the Other Realm become true in the mortal realm. And Harvey is pregnant!

title: Mom vs. Magic
description: Sabrina must make some hard decisions. Which boyfriend to have and whether to have her mother or her magic.

title: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad Season Opener
description: Sabrina is excited that she finally gets her witch's license, but now has to solve the family secret. She also decides to remain faithful to Harvey.

title: Boy Was My Face Red
description: To ease Valerie's embarrassment Sabrina casts a spell which helps Valerie, but the spell turns her face red.

title: Suspicious Minds
description: When a class project has couples pretending to be married, Libby gets Harvey and Sabrina has Roland spy on them. Roland wants to break them up so he gives Sabrina reports of how will they are getting along.

title: The Pom Pom Incident
description: Valerie announces that she wants to tryout for the second string cheerleaders squad. Sabrina wants to change her mind.

title: Pancake Madness
description: Sabrina becomes addicted to pancakes.

title: Good Will Haunting
description: Hilda and Zelda go to their Aunt Beulah's Halloween party that takes place in an asylum. Sabrina's party is terrorized by a talking doll from the Other Realm.

roles.char: Guy Who Thinks He's Gary Owens

title: You Bet Your Family
description: Salem loses Sabrina and her aunts in a poker game and they have to serve Diamond Dave for 20 years.

title: And the Sabrina Goes to...
description: When no one acknowledges her achievements Sabrina casts a spell and ends upon her own awards show.

title: Nobody Nose Libby Like Sabrina Nose Libby
description: Sabrina ends up on a journey through Libby ala "Fantastic Voyage."

title: Sabrina and the Beast
description: When Harvey and Sabrina go for the cutest couple title at high school she becomes too obsessed with her looks and her cousin turns Harvey into a beast.

title: Christmas Amnesia
description: Sabrina accidentally erases the memory of Christmas from the entire world.

title: Whose So-Called Life Is It Anyway?
description: Sabrina gives Valerie's family a wishbone wish despite warnings from the Witches Council.

title: What Price Harvey?
description: Harvey gets a bit too much ambition cologne while Hilda trades personalities with her zany cousin.

title: Mrs. Kraft
description: Angry when Zelda allows mean Mr. Kraft to stay in their home while his grandmother's home undergoes renovations, Sabrina and Hilda bring back Mr. Kraft's ex-wife, Lucy, not knowing that she too is a witch.

title: Sabrina and the Pirates
description: While her aunts are without their magic, Sabrina sneaks into an N'Sync concert.

title: Sabrina the Matchmaker
description: Sabrina has to bring together a couple for Valentine's Day or she's off to the Other Realm.

title: Salem, the Boy
description: Salem gets his wish to be human again for a day and becomes Sabrina's friend Gordie. And tries to take over the world.

title: Sabrina, the Teenage Writer
description: Sabrina receives a C on her English story and Zelda suggests she use a manual typewriter to help her out. The typewriter turns out to be magic and the characters from Sabrina's spy-story come to life and they're all clones of Harvey, Libby, Mr Kraft, Mrs Quick and Valerie. Hilda & Zelda receive Other Realm chain-letters and are bombarded with strange enchantments.

title: The Big Sleep
description: Sabrina wakes up Aunt Dorma from her hibernation who is unhappy and sends the Spellmans a house full of sleep inducing poppies.

title: Sabrina's Pen Pal
description: Sabrina finally meets her pen-pal from the Other Realm who is also a wanted jewel thief.

title: Sabrina's Real World
description: Salem has arranged for Sabrina's life to be a 24 hour a day reality show on Other Realm television.

title: The Long and Winding Short Cut
description: When Zelda tries to help Sabrina with the family secret, she gets banished to the Other Realm prairie without any modern conveniences.

title: Sabrina the Sandman
description: Sabrina gets a summer job as the local sandman and gets into trouble checking out her clients dreams.

title: Silent Movie
description: When Sabrina's evil vice principal, who is also Zelda's boyfriend, comes over for dinner, Sabrina and Hilda put "silent spells" on themselves to keep them from saying anything rude. Except, as Sabrina is later told by their talking black cat, Salem, when two silent spells are cast in the same household at the same time, the house becomes a silent movie.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Luau
description: While on a family vacation in Hawaii, Sabrina learns the family secret is that everyone has a twin. But is she the evil twin or is Katrina?

title: No Place Like Home
description: Sabrina goes to live with her father in Paris.

title: Dream a Little Dreama Me
description: Sabrina is back at high school watching an apprentice witch named Dreama and followed by a witch hunter named Brad who is also Harvey's best friend.

title: Jealousy
description: Sabrina is becoming jealous of the amount of time that Harvey is spending with Brad.

title: Little Orphan Hilda
description: Sabrina learns that Hilda and Zelda are adopted from her nagging grandma.

title: Spoiled Rotten
description: After getting a credit card from the Other Realm Sabrina becomes spoiled rotten and smells like it too!

title: Episode LXXXI: The Phantom Menace
description: Sabrina decides she is too old for Halloween and plans to spend it working at her new job in the coffee house. Her aunts try to convince her she can't run away from Halloween but she doesn't listen until a group of zombies trap her and Dreama in the coffee house. Zelda and Hilda invite Edgar Allen Poe around for dinner and Salem tries to find someone to read his horror stories to.

title: Prelude to a Kiss
description: Sabrina has a crush on Josh and asks Dreama to sub as "Sabrina" at Harvey's football game while she helps Josh with his studies.

title: Aging, Not So Gracefully
description: Sabrina makes herself look older for college student Josh, but her magic goes too far.

title: Love Means Having to Say You're Sorry
description: Harvey sees Sabrina kissing Josh and he breaks up with her.

title: Ice Station Sabrina
description: Harvey and Sabrina head up into the mountains for a ski weekend, however Brad comes along.

title: Salem and Juliette
description: Sabrina gets Salem a date for his class reunion, a female witch that has been turned into a cat.

title: Sabrina, Nipping at Your Nose
description: Sabrina wins a trip to Jamaica, but can't get out of Boston due to a snowstorm. After magically changing the weather, Mother Nature shows up and turns her into a snow-lady.

title: Now You See Her, Now You Don't
description: Trying to lose weight to fit into a dress, Sabrina's Other Realm remedy makes her disappear.

title: Super Hero
description: Mr. Kraft quits his job as principal and starts working at the coffee shop with Sabrina.

title: Love in Bloom
description: A valentine from a secret admirer arrives at the Spellman's house and no one knows which Spellman it is for.

title: Welcome Back, Duke
description: Salem's old acquittance Duke arrives after having finished his exile from witchdom. He wants to fit in, but his magic isn't what it used to be.

title: Salem's Daughter
description: Sabrina finds out that Salem's daughter is getting married in the Other Realm and Salem hasn't seen her in decades.

title: Dreama the Mouse
description: Sabrina has to fight a bad case of spring fever and deal with Dreama who has been turned into a mouse.

title: The Wild, Wild Witch
description: When upset with all the rules in her life, Sabrina is sent to an old west town that has no rules.

title: She's Baaaack!
description: Amanda shows up all of the sudden being Sabrina's best friend. Something has to be up with her.

title: The Four Faces of Sabrina
description: Four Sabrina's appear when she is indecisive about her college choice and is being pushed toward four different schools by her friends and her aunts.

title: The End of an Era
description: Josh and Harvey are both fighting over Sabrina and they have to take a magical test. Afterwards Harvey announces that he knows that Sabrina is a witch.

title: Every Witch Way But Loose
description: Sabrina goes to college and moves into an old house with roomies Roxie, Morgan and Miles. She finds out she can't live a completely normal life as a witch.

title: Double Time
description: Sabrina casts a spell to speed herself up. Zelda takes a position as a prof at the college.

title: Heart of the Matter
description: Hilda takes over the coffee shop while Sabrina casts a spell so she'll say yes to everyone who asks her out after turning down too many dates.

title: You Can't Twin
description: Sabrina runs into Katrina who steals her Other Realm passport and goes to the mortal world to wreck her life.

title: House of Pi's
description: Sabrina goes undercover at Morgan's sorority to land a newspaper reporter slot, but has second thoughts.

title: The Halloween Scene
description: Sabrina has a Halloween party at her old place and ends up counseling Frankensein and his bride.

title: Welcome, Traveler
description: Sabrina insists that Miles get more social and he ends up in a cult where its leader claims to be a witch. Sabrina looks into it.

title: Some of My Best Friends Are Half-Mortal
description: Zelda fixes Sabrina up with a male witch which is fine until she comes up against prejudice because she is half mortal.

title: Lost at C
description: Sabrina is totally devastated when she receives her first C and then Zelda takes up with the same professor.

title: Sabrina's Perfect Christmas
description: Spending Christmas with Morgan's family is not as perfect as it seems.

title: My Best Shot
description: Giving Josh a confidence boost makes him quit his job at the coffee shop.

title: Tick-Tock Hilda's Clock
description: Hilda feels her biological clock is ticking and decides to have is slowed down. Sabrina goes to retrieve it and then loses it. Now she has to have a child in 48 hours and has to get married.

title: Sabrina's New Roommate
description: Zelda stays with Sabrina for a few days and her roommates try to loosen her up a bit.

title: Making the Grade
description: Sabrina writes an article for the paper about how the school athletes get special treatment.

title: Love Is a Many Complicated Thing
description: Morgan fixes Sabrina up with a date so she can double-date on Valentine's Day with Josh. Sabrina learns that Josh is breaking up with Morgan.

title: Sabrina, the Muse
description: When Kevin says that Sabrina was the inspiration for his songs, Sabrina feels like she has to be his muse 24 hours a day.

title: Beach Blanket Bizarro
description: Sabrina, Kevin, Miles, Roxie, Morgan and Josh plan to spend Spring Break in Florida but Sabrina's aunts are worried, so they cast a 'Good Clean Fun' spell, transforming the resort into a '60s beach movie.

title: Witchright Hall
description: Sabrina's cousin Amanda is sent to live a year in the mortal realm at a school for maladjusted witches.

title: Sabrina, the Activist
description: Saving a historical building becomes Sabrina's new cause as she becomes closer with Josh.

title: Do You See What I See?
description: Miles sees Sabrina's flying car and makes a report on an UFO sighting.

title: Sabrina's Got Spirit
description: Miles has a paranormal detection device that goes crazy near Sabrina.

title: Finally!
description: Josh and Sabrina host a singles night at the coffee house and get into an argument after his friend stands up Roxie.

title: Really Big Season Opener
description: Sabrina and Miles decide to produce a horror picture and some of the actors may be real monsters.

title: Sabrina's Date with Destiny
description: Josh returns from his summer in Prague and says that he's taking a job overseas.

title: What's News
description: Josh's newspaper job is taking all of his time away from Sabrina and she finds out that Morgan is dating Harvey.

title: Murder on the Halloween Express
description: Sabrina is fed up with her friends' unenthusiastic attitudes towards Halloween so she plans for them to go on a Halloween Murder Mystery Train. But she doesn't realize it's a magical train that turns them into their characters: Sabrina as the detective; Harvey as 'Biff Buffington' - tennis champion; Morgan as an English countess; Roxie as Hortense, the countess's maid; Miles as a foreign professor and Josh as a photographer. And Josh is the murder victim.

title: The Gift of Gab
description: Sabrina and Roxie get their own call in college radio show. Sabrina is tongue tied while Roxie takes right to it. Sabrina then bows out and lets Roxie have the show.

title: Thin Ice
description: When Harvey needs help on the Boston College hockey team, she gets him skates from the god Mercury.

title: Hex, Lies, and No Video Tape
description: Josh gets Sabrina a job at the newspaper, but she wants to keep their relationship a secret so people don't think she got the job as the photographer's girlfriend.

title: Humble Pie
description: After Morgan spends all her money, borrows from her roommates and then gets cut off by her parents, Sabrina gives her a taste of magical humble pie.

title: A Birthday Witch
description: Great-aunt Irma comes to test Harvey's trustworthiness when she learns that he knows that Sabrina is a witch.

title: Deliver Us from E-Mail
description: Katrina gives Sabrina a virus that turns her into an airhead. She also wants to start her own column in the paper.

title: Cloud Ten
description: Rejection on a garbage strike story sends Sabrina to the Other Realm for a trip to Cloud 10.

title: Sabrina and the Candidate
description: Sabrina is wrong in her expose on a shady politician.

title: I Think I Love You
description: When Sabrina tries to say "I Love You" after Josh professes his love, it comes out in a funny voice. The Love Doctor says that she has to tell him that she is a witch.

title: The Arrangement
description: Great-aunt Irma shows up with a witch named Peter that Sabrina is supposed to marry immediately. Peter doesn't want to get married and falls for Roxie.

title: Time After Time
description: Sabrina uses magic to erase Zelda's broken heart, but the change in history erases Sabrina.

title: Sabrina and the Kiss
description: Sabrina kisses an old boyfriend and Josh says that he doesn't mind, but Sabrina wonders.

title: The Competition
description: Sabrina is annoyed when Josh says that women can't play tennis so she gets professional and magical help. Zelda and Hilda coach Amanda for her witch's license.

title: I, Busybody
description: After Sabrina tries to give everyone advice it seems to backfire every time.

title: Guilty!
description: Zelda is being nominated for Professor of the year until they find out she went to college in 1873 and they fire her.

title: The Whole Ball of Wax
description: Sabrina finds out her mysterious stalker is her mother. Once they have contact as warned she turns into a ball of wax.

title: Driving Mr. Goodman
description: Sabrina gets into a minor car accident and the other party sues her for a fortune.

title: I Fall to Pieces
description: Hilda finds her true love at a food court and gets married.

title: Total Sabrina Live: Part 2
description: Morgan submits Sabrina's article to a contest and she lands a job at Scorch magazine. Zelda and Hilda move back to the Other Realm and Sabrina and friends move into their house.

title: The Big Head
description: Sabrina's first assignment at Scorch is to interview a rock star which Sabrina ends up teaching a bit of humility.

title: Call Me Crazy
description: First Sabrina thinks everyone considers her too young, then her babbling about herself and (oops!) magic has them thinking she's bonkers and finally an interview with Ashanti gives her some newfound respect.

title: Shift Happens
description: Nervous about an interview with a hip-hop diva causes Sabrina to cast a spell exchanging their personalities.

title: Free Sabrina
description: Sabrina's plan to catch a light fingered diva in the act lands Sabrina in jail.

title: Sabrina Unplugged
description: Sabrina gets caught using her magic on Leonard's web-cam. While in his computer trying to destroy the evidence she gets an involuntary makeover and winds up looking like a cartoon siren.

title: Witch Way Out
description: Sabrina decides to go out on a date as a mortal and entrusts her magic to Harvey. Her date only wants to put her in his zoo.

title: Bada-Ping!
description: Sabrina sees a concert of a pop star that is being blackmailed by a gangsters. Sabrina gets threatened by the same underworld character.

title: It's a Hot, Hot, Hot, Hot Christmas
description: The girls visit Miami for Christmas and have a run-in with Roxie's mom who gets accused of robbing their timeshare.

title: Ping Ping a Song
description: The girls audition for a television talent show with a bit of help from Sabrina's magic.

title: The Lyin', the Witch and the Wardrobe
description: Sabrina gets a job for Morgan to provide clothes for a celebrity photo shoot, but in the end has to fire her.

title: In Sabrina We Trust
description: Their house must undergo an Other Realm magical systems check without Roxie or Morgan learning about it. Finally Sabrina uses her magic on Roxie to gain her trust.

title: Sabrina in Wonderland
description: Sabrina wants to know why she keeps running into the same guy and has to go through Wonderland before she can learn the answer.

title: Present Perfect
description: Sabrina casts a spell to eliminate all her flaws to make herself perfect.

title: Cirque du Sabrina
description: After Sabrina's room turns into a circus tent, she must walk up and down the tightrope until she finds a balance in life between boyfriend, friends and her job.

title: Getting to Nose You
description: Sabrina gets tongue tied around Aaron and turns herself into a smooth talker. Her duplicate Cyrano tries to steal Aaron and Harvey confesses his love for Sabrina to Roxie and Morgan.

title: Romance Looming
description: Sabrina makes the fates mad when she saves Morgan's life and Aaron confesses his love to Sabrina.

title: Spellmanian Slip
description: When bickering breaks out at Sabrina's dinner with her future in-laws she casts a harmony spell and everyone breaks out in song.

title: You Slay Me
description: After asking Cinderella for advice on her wedding, Sabrina literally turns into a monster about the preparations.

title: A Fish Tale
description: When Aunt Irma finds out that Sabrina is marrying a mortal she turns Aaron into a fish. The episode ends with Sabrina finding Harvey's note that says that he will always love her.

title: What a Witch Wants
description: The girls go on a bachelorette cruise into the Bermuda Triangle where witches lose their powers.

title: Soul Mates
description: On the day of her wedding Sabrina is still trying to find whether her groom or Harvey is her real soul-mate.
